contents: Telecommuting involves working from a location aside from the company’s offices, (14) <u>essentially</u> an employee’s home or a nearby workspace. Because telecommuting can be (15) <u>mutually beneficial,</u> Draden Software Company provides a telecommuting option for positions where working from the company’s offices is not a necessity. A telecommuting arrangement may be terminated by the company or the telecommuting employee at any time.
